Keywords: Armor , Batman Family , Detective , Future , Gotham City , Justice League , Martial Artist , Project Cadmus
Real Name: Terry McGinnis
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
THANKS FOR THE WARNING: Super Senses. When Batman Beyond uses it, increase the result by +1 if the attacker was targeted with Outwit since your last turn.
SCHWAY: Precision Strike. // FREE: Make an attack, but only to target opposing characters that have been targeted with Outwit this turn. Hit characters are dealt a maximum of 1 damage.
ANY SUGGESTIONS, BOSS?: Outwit. When Batman Beyond uses it, if he occupies hindering terrain, he may use it regardless of line of fire.
